abstract: DealBook Online; Ukraine says holders of Ukrainian bonds should expect to lose some of their principal in negotiations with government.
lead_paragraph: The country’s finance minister warned that creditors should not hold out against a settlement that includes a reduction in their principal.

headline.main: Ukraine Tells Bondholders to Expect Some Losses

snippet: The country’s finance minister warned that creditors should not hold out against a settlement that includes a reduction in their principal.
